# mapRect

**Interface Property**

A rectangular area on a two-dimensional map projection.

## Declaration

```swift
mapRect: MapRect;
```

## Discussion

Thie mapRect is an instance of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapRect].

## Defining a Camera Boundary

- **region**: A rectangular area on a map, defined by coordinates of the rectangle’s northeast and southwest corners.
